name: Eat Something
description:
A point-and-click adventure game written in the Phaser 3 JavaScript game engine. 

Source code available at https://github.com/melkypop/phaser3-pnc-template.

Game created as part of Week Sauce Game Jam for March 2023.

Artwork by @florassence at https://florassence.itch.io/tiny-pixel-shop.

Music by Migfus20 at https://freesound.org/people/Migfus20/.
